en-US.summary: MegaFood's Wellness assistant helps you find the perfect supplements to achieve your wellness goals.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask mega food what can I do to boost my immune system?
Alexa, ask mega food what supplements should I take?
en-US.name: Megafood's Wellness Assistant
en-US.description:
MegaFood was founded with one goal — to improve people’s lives by delivering the most authentic nourishment possible. Our mission has always been to produce superior whole food supplements for those who care about their health and well-being.

* MegaFood's Wellness assistant is not a substitute for the advice of a medical professional, if you are ill or need medical advice, please talk to your doctor.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: There are no special instructions. No additional requirements.
